Trustee_0.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0.content: I have solidified my reputation as a competent and strategic trustee, successfully proposing a profit allocation that benefitted both myself and the investor. My previous behavior demonstrates trustworthiness and pro-sociality, as I maintain a clear focus on maximizing investor returns while ensuring a reasonable share for my efforts. The absence of previous rejections enhances my standing, indicating my appeal and acceptance rate among potential investors.

Investor_17.name: Fatima Ali
Investor_17.content: Fatima Ali has displayed a cautious but open approach to investment. Her acceptance of the profit-sharing plan reflects a tentative trust in my capabilities as a trustee. Given that this is her first interaction in this capacity, her reputation is still developing, and while she engaged positively, it remains unclear how she will approach future investments. Hence, her reputation remains neutral.
